events.name: InventoryItemAdded
events.description: Captures the event of a new item being added to the inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemRemoved
events.description: Captures the event of an item being removed from the inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemUpdated
events.description: Captures changes made to existing inventory items.

events.name: InventoryStockChecked
events.description: Captures the action of checking current stock levels in the inventory.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures the event of a new item being added to the inventory.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures the event of an item being removed from the inventory.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures changes made to existing inventory items.

commands.name: CheckInventoryStock
commands.description: Captures the action of checking current stock levels in the inventory.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration point for supplier details related to inventory items.

integrationPoints.name: SalesManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration point to link inventory with sales transactions.

integrationPoints.name: WarehouseManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration point for warehouse operations related to inventory.

integrationPoints.name: Reporting
integrationPoints.description: Integration for generating reports based on inventory data.
